law.catch_line: Filing by the Secretary of State -- Entity to be in good standing -- Exceptions.

text.section: An entity or foreign entity shall be in good standing in order for documents delivered by or on behalf of the entity or foreign entity to be filed by the Secretary of State.

Notwithstanding that an entity or foreign entity is not in good standing, the registered agent may deliver for filing and the Secretary of State may file:
The resignation of the registered agent, the discontinuance of the registered office, or both; or
A change of registered office filed by the registered agent.

law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 29, sec. 1, effective June 8, 2011.
